Caudalie founder Mathilde Thomas discovered this precious water on her parent’s vineyard in Bordeaux when her family during the harvest to extract water from the grapes. "This is literally pure grape water, so you can think of this as like a fire hydrant for your face. If you have irritation, if you have dryness, if you have anything that is going on that you just want to soothe it, calm it, hydrate it, bring it back to normal-that’s what this does and it’s incredible. Plus, you can set your makeup in the end with it, too!"-David Razzano, Sephora Pro Artist "Our entire Sephora Pro Team is obsessed with this because we realize that it takes away redness in the skin, so it’s perfect for a person like myself who gets super flushed every time I do any activity at all. This is like a quick fix because it just takes the redness down pretty immediately. We use it backstage a lot in fashion week because it basically takes down that redness."-Helen Phillips, Sephora Pro Artist Research results: In a corneometry, 12 volunteers: - +127% immediate hydration In a clinical test, 20 volunteers: - -62% in skin sensitivity Clean at Sephora When you spot our Clean seal, you can be sure we’ve checked that this brand’s product is made without the ingredients you told us you’d most like to avoid. Clinical Results: A 2012 study on the effects of rhodiola extract on mental performance under stress and fatigue found the group who received the active ingredients had lower fatigue and performed better than those who received the placebo. This trial evaluated the impact of a Rhodiola rosea L. extract on self-reported anxiety, stress, cognition, and other mood symptoms. Eighty mildly anxious participants were randomized into 2 different groups of either Rhodiola rosea L (2 × 200 mg dose) or a control condition (no treatment). Self-report measures and cognitive tests were completed at four testing sessions over a period of 14 days. Relative to the controls, the experimental group demonstrated a significant reduction in self-reported, anxiety, stress, anger, confusion, and depression at 14 days and a significant improvements in total mood. *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.

People also apply it to soften their skin, relax their muscles, and nourish their hair. Baussan started to establish a sustainable commercial relationship starting from 1981, with women in Burkina Faso, to buy shea butter. Twenty years ago, fewer than 100 women were producing shea butter for L'OCCITANE, and now more than 15,000 are working in four different groups.

Based upon data calculated from Food Chemistry (Nov. 2013) and the US Department of Agriculture (March 2014). The kakadu plum included in the product has been combined with stabilized vitamin C from other sources. Note that the vitamin content of natural foods are estimates and vary depending upon conditions such as soil, temperature, and climate. What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- Phthalates What else you need to know:"When I formulated U.F.O., I wanted to create a dry oil that practically disappears into the skin, leaving oily skin smooth (but never greasy) and yet effectively treated for blemishes and blackheads. Salicylic acid is notoriously over-drying, leaving your skin stripped and looking irritated. By infusing salicylic acid into clarifying oils (like tea tree oil and black cumin seed oil), the drying effects of salicylic acid are nipped in the bud, while all of the treatment aspects (like clearing congested pores and managing blackheads and blemishes) are in full-force. U.F.O. is part of the new Green Line, along with Martian Mattiyfing Melting Water-Gel Toner, created specifically for oily skin clients."-Sunday Riley

name: Nutrient-Charged Water Gel
description: Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ Dry✔ SensitiveWhat it is:A lightweight, oil-free gel moisturizer with cumulative hydration-release technology that locks moisture to skin and increases retention for up to five days.Solutions for:- Dryness- Fine lines and wrinkles- Dullness and uneven textureIf you want to know more… This moisturizer features a unique blend of five minerals, five vitamins, and five peptides that helps strengthen the skin’s barrier in as little as 30 minutes to prevent water loss while plumping and smoothing skin. Vitamins alleviate dryness, provide anti-wrinkle benefits, and soothe as essential minerals support healthy-looking skin tone and texture. Five potent peptides help visibly restore damaged skin.What it is formulated WITHOUT:- Parabens- Sulfates- PhthalatesWhat else you need to know:This product features limited-edition Hydration packaging to celebrate Murad’s 30-year anniversary as the skincare hydration experts. Just a dime-sized amount of Nutrient-Charged Water Gel provides enough hydration for wearing alone, or underneath your SPF and makeup. It is cruelty-free, and formulated without gluten and animal-derived ingredients.There are many factors that contribute to a damaged skin barrier, including emotional stress, fatigue, dehydration, pollution, and over-exfoliation. When the barrier is damaged, skin experiences redness, dryness, and tightness. However, when the barrier is healthy, skin appears even-toned, clear, smooth, and balanced. "‘Eat your water’ is a phrase I have been using for many years. Staying sufficiently hydrated isn’t just about drinking eight glasses of water a day. When we eat more water-rich foods, we absorb water more slowly because it is trapped in the nutritional structure of these foods. Slow absorption means that water in food stays in our bodies longer to optimize hydration. The same rule applies to skin. Applying nutrient-rich ingredients will strengthen the skin barrier and help our skin trap and hold onto more water, longer. That’s how the formula for Nutrient-Charged Water Gel was born."-Howard Murad, M.D., FAAD Research results:Clinically tested by an independent laboratory and proven safe for sensitive skin. Based on a technology-tested clinical study of 20 people, after 3 weeks of continuous use:- 100% showed skin barrier repair in 30 minutes- Locks moisture to skin and increases retention for up to 5 days-Takes skin from dry to hydrated with just 1 use (clinically tested and proven via 3D Moisture Mapping Technology)

name: Exfoliating Swipeys
description: Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ Dry✔ Sensitive What it is:A pack of single-use facial pads soaked in an all-natural AHA solution that perfectly exfoliates and hydrates the skin for a healthy-looking glow. Solutions for:- Acne and blemishes- Fine lines and wrinkles- Dullness and uneven textureIf you want to know more…Exfoliation is an enormously vital part of any skincare routine, but not all exfoliation is equal. Chemical exfoliation (the use of naturally-occurring acids to remove dead skin cells, usually AHAs or BHAs) tends to give a far more thorough, even result than scrubbing your face with harsh, jagged particles. Which is why Go-To Skincare prefers it. Combining the effectiveness of lactic acid, the most gentle of all AHAs, with ultra-hydrating essential oils, these Exfoliating Swipeys thoroughly remove dead skin cells (the cause of dull skin and congestion), refine skin texture, minimize the appearance of fine lines, and moisturize. name: D-Bronzi™ Anti-Pollution Sunshine Drops
description: Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ DryWhat it is:A serum that immediately replenishes the delicate balance that supports a healthy barrier function of skin-like sunshine’s bronzy color, delivered without the damage.Solutions for:- Fine lines and wrinkles- Uneven skin tone- Dullness and uneven textureIf you want to know more… These drops include a chronopeptide that mimics the antioxidant benefits of vitamin D, omega-rich virgin marula, and black currant seed oils, along with vitamin F (fatty acids), to replenish the delicate balance that supports a healthy skin barrier function. "I’m inside most days. I don’t wear foundation, but I really wanted a little something I could mix into my other products to give my skin some color. The problem was I didn’t want to risk a breakout and I couldn’t find one that fit my Suspicious 6-free criteria. So, after a few attempts, we landed on a silky, natural-looking, bronzing concentrate. My chemist told me later that they were high-fiving each other in the lab because they had never before been able to create a formulation like this that was silicone-free. D-Bronzi™ is made of vitamins, antioxidants, platinum peptides, and barrier-supportive fatty acids that defend skin from environmental free radicals. It’s a gorgeous sheer bronzer that I formulated with skin health top-of-mind...like sunshine in a bottle without the damage. I hope you fall #drunkinlove!"-Tiffany Masterson, Brand FounderFree of essential oils, silicones, and fragrance.Drunk Elephant is committed to using only ingredients that either directly benefit the skin’s health or support the integrity and effectiveness of their formulations. They never take into account an ingredient’s synthetic or natural status, but instead choose based on its biocompatibility. You won’t find what Drunk Elephant calls the "Suspicious 6" in their products (essential oils, drying alcohols, silicones, chemical screens, fragrance/dyes, and SLS,) making them, in their opinion, appropriate for all skin. They believe that these six ubiquitous ingredients are at the root of almost every skin issue we see. When formulating the products, they focus on pH levels and safety, always making sure that the active ingredients are at efficacious levels. This is the Drunk Elephant difference.Drunk Elephant is a supporter of IEF (International Elephant Foundation) and is cruelty-free. The best way to manage stress is through balance, and I formulated Revitalixir™ Recovery Serum with a balancing blend of relaxing and reviving extracts to help manage the visible effects of stress, minimize skin fatigue, and renew vibrancy in an instant and over time."-Howard Murad, M.D., FAAD Research results:Clinically tested by an independent laboratory and proven safe for sensitive skin.

name: EGF Serum
description: Which skin type is it good for?✔ Normal✔ Oily✔ Combination✔ Dry✔ Sensitive What it is:A powerful age-defying serum that visibly minimizes fine lines and wrinkles, rejuvenates the skin’s complexion, and restores its youthful radiance, as well as delivering hydration. Solutions for: - Fine lines and wrinkles - Loss of firmness and elasticity - Dullness and uneven texture If you want to know more…This award-winning, bestselling serum replenishes the body’s own natural supply of EGF (Epidermal Growth Factor) and rejuvenates skin cells, thus helping to slow the aging process. From birth until adulthood, our bodies manufacture copious amounts of proteins called growth factors that communicate with cells, sending messages to repair, rejuvenate, and so on. EGF is one of the most important growth factor for skin cells, helping them to boost production of collagen and elastin and increase the skin’s capacity to retain water to maintain healthy, youthful and dense skin. When we reach maturity, production of growth factors diminishes. As a result, cell turnover and repair slows, eventually affecting our appearance. In fact, skin density thins by one percent each year after we turn twenty, and it is further reduced by up to 30 percent during menopause. Skin starts to sag and fine lines and wrinkles appear. There are many factors that play a role in skin aging and some are beyond our control, like genetics. We can, however, lead a healthy lifestyle, protect our skin from the sun, and use effective anti-aging skincare products. What else you need to know: This serum contains only seven ingredients; no preservatives or additives. The bottle may be small but the serum inside is incredibly potent and long-lasting. You only need two to four drops per nighttime use to see visible, lasting results. The barley-based EGF is uniquely pure and grown in an ecologically-engineered greenhouse in Iceland with a negative CO2 footprint. Research results:An independent scientific double-blind split-face study, that included 29 women using Cellular Age-Defying Serum twice, daily for 2 months demonstrated: - 60% increase in skin thickness - 30% increase in skin density
